sections.title: Introduction to Python
sections.content: Learn what Python is and why it's a great language for beginners. Set up a Python environment on your computer.
sections.activity: Write your first Python program to print 'Hello, World!' and your name.

sections.title: Variables and Data Types
sections.content: Explore how to store and manipulate different types of data in Python.
sections.activity: Create a 'Mad Libs' style game that asks for inputs and creates a funny story.

sections.title: Loops and Conditionals
sections.content: Learn how to use loops and if-statements to control the flow of your Python programs.
sections.activity: Create a simple number guessing game using while loops and if-statements.

sections.title: Functions and Modules
sections.content: Discover how to create reusable pieces of code with functions and how to use Python modules.
sections.activity: Create a simple calculator program using functions for each operation.

sections.title: Simple Game Development
sections.content: Learn how to create a simple text-based adventure game using Python.
sections.activity: Design and code a short text-based adventure game with multiple paths and outcomes.
